about_the_game:
Visit the forgotten Island of Paracelsus on a journey of exploration and mayhem as you discover new types of elemental Blobbs and face off against 4 brand new boss blobbs who wield the power of the Fire, Ice, Electricity and Stone.


  • Challenge yourself with another 50 brand new levels showcasing the new Blaze, Frosty and Shocker elemental blobbs, plus an unique stone variant of the Armour Blobb which can only be found on the island of Paracelsus.
  • Face off against four new "Elemental Master" bosses with gameplay mechanics designed around their element and created especially for this Level Pack.
  • The Elemental Mayhem Level Pack also includes an additional 8 in game (and Steam) achievements to unlock.
